body:
@killeent @soumith do you think it would be worth it to also add support for `AdvancedIndexSelect` to autograd? This way we would have complete [differentiation for indexing as well](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/autograd/_functions/tensor.py#L223) (for the moment `index` only supports up to 2 backwards).

I think it would only require adding a new python class, as the backward of `index_select` is `index_add`, and we already have `AdvancedIndexAdd`.
